txt.en:
'A key to Carn Dûm... who would have dreamed anyone would wish to enter that accursed city.

'Well, there is little else that I can do for you. You should return now to your task.

'Good fortune to you, [placeholder].'
'You have returned with the key! Let us hope, my friend, that the key from which this was cast was not a false guide....'
Good fortune to you, [placeholder]. You and your friends in Angmar will need it.'
'That key should do all that you need, [placeholder]. You should return now to your task and make use of it!'
'The Morroval have seen you! I must flee!'
After retrieving Thrór's Hammer and the necessary materials, Dwalin's smith, Litli, forged for you a mithril key that should allow you to pass the gates of Carn Dûm.
Return the Carn Dûm gate key to Lorniel
Lorniel awaits your return at Gath Forthnír in eastern Angmar.\n\nYou should return with the key to Lorniel.
